root.data: The WHO Framework Convention on Tobacco Control (WHO FCTC) was adopted by the World Health Assembly on 21 May 2003 (Resolution 56.1) and entered into force on 27 February 2005. In 2010, Conference of the Parties adopted Decision FCTC/COP4(16), which requests the Convention Secretariat, in cooperation with competent authorities within WHO, in particular the Tobacco Free Initiative, to further standardize definitions and indicators and facilitate regular review of progress in implementation of the Convention. See https://apps.who.int/gb/fctc/PDF/cop4/FCTC_COP4_DIV6-en.pdf
